327224.「ただいまより 第１３回\n アストルティア・クイーン コンテストの\n 結果発:
We will now announce the results of the 13th
Astoltia Queen Contest!

327225.「この ショコラフォンテヌ城の\n クイーンの座は いったい 誰の手に！？\n:
Who is worthy of being crowned Queen of our
Chocolat Fontenay Castle?! The results are
in!!

327226.「皆さま！ ステージに ご注目ください！:
Ladies and gentlemen! Please look to the
stage!

327227.「ただいまより 第１３回\n アストルティア・クイーン コンテストに\n 参加す:
It's time to introduce the fierce beauties
who will be participating in this year's
12th Annual Astoltia Queen Contest!

327228.「前大会で 好成績をおさめ\n 見事 出場権を獲得した ３名に加え……:
And now, joining the 3 winners with excellent
results from last year's contest...

327229.「ファルパパ神による特別推薦枠 １名と\n 総勢４８人の予選を勝ち抜いた 上位４:
We have a special recommendation from Falpapa,
as well as 4 winners from 48 preliminary
contestants. 8 beauties will aim for the top!

327230.「まずは 前大会の覇者が 堂々の登場だ！\n 初出場にして 流星のごとく クイー:
First, we have our winner from the previous contest! A true angel who came down like a shooting star, claiming the throne in her
first debut!

327231.「人を愛する その気高き心は 時代を超え\n あらゆる者たちを 光で包み込む！\:
The noble heart that loves all people, transcending time itself and embracing all with its radiant light! The Eternal Archangel,
Lectalis!

327232.「このコンテストに また出場することができて\n うれしいよ。きみたちに会える:
I'm happy to be able to participate in this
contest once more. I've looked forward this
day...where I'd be able to see you all.

327233.「クイーンの座を ふたたび 勝ち取ることは\n 並大抵の努力じゃ 成しとげられな:
Winning the throne of Queen again won't be
easy. Even still...I want to see the greatest
future.

327234.「さあ 一緒に 高く舞い上がろう。\n きみさえ そばにいてくれたら\n どんな:
Come on, let's soar high together!
With you by my side, I feel like I can do
anything!

327235.「続きまして こちらも前大会 初出場にして\n ２位に輝いた このお方！:
Next up, this lady made her debut in the last
contest, coming in an impressive second
place!

327236.「かわいらしい風貌と あなどることなかれ！\n その正体は エルフたちを司る\n:
You'd best not underestimate her cute appearance! Her true identityーthe goddess of wind who watches over the elves! The Cool
Breeze, Eldona!

327237.「前回は レクタが優勝して うれしいのと\n 負けてしまって 悔しいのとで\n:
I had mixed emotions last time... I was happy
that Lecta won, but I was frustrated that I
lost!

327238.「でも 今回 私が優勝すれば\n おあいこですのよ。\n だから 今度こそ 負け:
But if I win this time, we'll be even.
That's why I definitely can't lose!

327239.「私が目指すのは クイーンの座のみ！\n 愛しき眷属たちよ。清らかな風の民よ。\:
My only goalーthe Queen's throne! My beloved
kin...my people of the pure winds...
I believe in the strength of your support!

327240.「続いては 前回３位の座を射止めました\n このお方……。:
Next up, our third place winner from last
time...

327241.「おっと……すまんな。\n 我が愛馬アイシクルも やる気十分のようだ。:
Oh...apologies.
My beloved steed Icicle is more than ready.

327242.「愛馬と共に その勇姿を見せつけたのは\n 魔界に君臨する 魔王にして 最強の戦:
Showing off her majesty alongside her beloved steedーThe reigning Demon King and strongest of the Demon World! The Ice Witch who brings
death...Valeria!

327243.「魔王である この私が 天使や神ごときに\n いつまでも クイーンの座を\n 明:
As a Demon King, I have no intention of
letting the throne be ruled forever by mere
angels or gods.

327244.「今年こそは 魔界を代表して\n 私が 勝利の栄光を つかんでみせる！\n その:
This year...as representative of the Demon
World, I will seize a glorious victory! Watch
closely with your own eyes!

327245.「続きましては ファルパパ神による\n 特別推薦枠 １名を ご紹介しましょう！:
Next on our list, I'd like to introduce our
special recommendation by Falpapa!

327246.「未知なる大地に挑む 燈火の調査隊の一員！\n 個性あふれる愛称で 隊員たちの心:
A member of the Ember Explorers, venturing into lands unknown! With her unique nicknames, she's certainly captured the hearts of her
team! The cheery flower girl, Porte!

327247.「へ～ ここが ショコラフォンテヌ城かあ！\n とっても かわいい お城だね！\:
Wow... So this is Chocolat Fontenay Castle!
It's so cute! I can't wait to show my master!

327248.「今日は あたしから みんなに\n プレゼントが あるんだ。\n むむむむぅ～～:
I've got a present for everyone here
today!
Hnnnng... Ta-da!

327249.「気に入ってくれたかな？\n あっ！ 花よりチョコがいい そこのキミには\n あ:
Do you like it? Oh! So you like chocolate
better than flowers? Vote for me, and it's
all yours!

327250.「ここからは 激しい予選を勝ち抜いた４名の方を\n ご紹介いたします。第４位に:
Now, allow me to introduce the four contestants who made their way through the preliminaries! Claiming fourth place
is another Ember Explorer!

327251.「……以上 ８名の美女たちが\n クイーンの座をかけて コンテストを争います。:
And so...these 8 beauties will compete to see
who is most deserving to be called Queen.

327252.「栄光の座に かがやくのは\n 果たして 誰なのか！？\n それを決めるのは あ:
Who will rise to the top this time?! It's up
to you to decide!

327253.「どうですか <pc>さん。\n 今回も選りすぐりの美女が そろいました。\n:
Well, what do you think? There's an amazing
selection of beautiful women for you to choose
this time. Who's your favorite?

327254.「クイーンにふさわしいと思う 美女が決まったら\n あなたの持つ票を 投じてあげ:
If you think any of these beauties deserves
to be Queen, then cast your votes!

327255.「なお 投票につきましては 集計係モカの所で\n おこなっていただくことに なっ: Please go and see Mocha if you'd like to vote.

327256.「票を投じましたら お話がありますので\n 私の所に お立ち寄りください。\n:
After voting, come back and see me so we
can chat. I'll be waiting outside!

328417.「実直な神官と 荘厳な竜という\n ふたつの魅力を 合わせ持つ！\n 竜の世界の:
A devoted priestess and a majestic dragon, combining into something quite enchanting! The Devout Heroine from the world of
dragons...Estella!

328418.「ねえ ドベルニッチ。\n 久しぶりの出場で 緊張してしまうわ。\n どうすれば:
Say, Dobernitch... It's been a while since I
was last here, so I'm feeling a bit nervous...
What do you think I should do?

328419.「こ…これは ちがうんです！ 少し\n 気合いを 入れていただけで……それだけ:
I...it's not what it looks like! I just put in
a little extra effort, that's all... That's
how strongly I feel about this contest!

328420.「再び この場に戻ってこられたからには\n ナドラガンドを代表して 全力を尽くし:
Now that I've made my return, I will do my
best to represent Nadragand. Please lend me
your strength.

328421.「続いて 予選を第３位で突破した\n こちらの方に ご登場いただきましょう。:
Next up is this individual, who placed third
in the preliminaries.

328422.「惜しみない努力によって 日々 成長する\n その姿は 人々を 魅了してやまない:
Through tireless effort, her daily growth
captivates all who see it!
The Battle Princess of Purity, Anlucia!

328423.「……どれほど この日を 待ったことか。\n 先の祭りから１年間 鍛え抜いた\n:
How long have I waited for this day...
I've trained very hard since the last contest,
so now you will see just how much I've grown.

328424.「……っと いけないわ。\n あの方の口調が うつっちゃったみたい。\n 自分を:
Oops, I shouldn't...
I seem to have picked up on *his* way of
speaking... I need to be more careful!

328425.「応援してくれる人たちが いるかぎり\n 私は 何度だって 挑みつづける……。\:
As long as there are those who support me, I
will never give up... I shall reclaim my
throne as Queen this year!

328426.「続きましては 予選を２位で突破！\n 初登場から 毎年 欠かすことなく\n 出:
Next up is second place from the preliminaries. Truly a regular among regulars, she's participated every single year
without fail!

328427.「彼女に いやされるなら\n ベホイムなんか 目じゃない！\n アラハギーロの青:
If it's a heal from her, then a Moreheal
doesn't even compare!
The Blue Guide of Al-Ahagiro, Seraphi!

328428.「やっほー！ 前は 失敗しちゃったけど\n あれからまた 一生懸命 練習したんだ:
Hi there!! I didn't win last time, but I've
practiced a lot since.
Okay then, here I go!

328430.「やったー！ 成功したよ！\n みんな 元気いっぱいに なったかな？\n この勢:
Yay, it worked! I wonder if everyone's all
full of energy now? I hope we can keep
us this momentum and win!

328431.「さあ 第１３回\n アストルティア・クイーン コンテスト\n 大トリを飾るのは:
And now, our final contestant for the
13th Astoltia Queen Contest is...!

328432.「お母さんになってほしい女性 ナンバーワン！\n それでいて 理想の妻！ 尚且つ:
The number one woman I want as my mother! The ideal wifeーand a fine lady from a noble family to boot! The Elegant of a Faraway Era,
Marone!

328433.「昨年のナイトコンテストでは 夫のパドレが\n お世話になりました。あの人が 奮:
Thank you for taking care of my husband Padre
during last year's Knight Contest. I was so
impressed with how bravely he fought.

328434.「このコンテストへの参加が 決まってから\n あの人と 誓ったんです。\n 今年:
Once I decided to enter, we vowed to one
another...that we would together become the
Queen and Knight of this year.

328435.「皆さん。どうか 私たちの夢の\n お手伝いを していただけませんか？\n あな:
Would everyone please help us in making our
dream come true? We eagerly await your votes.
